en-US.title: Recovery Pulse — Sovereign Performance
en-US.subtitle: Elite Bio-Data & Recovery
en-US.description:
Your body speaks in data. Recovery Pulse translates.

Transform your daily wellness check-in into precision insights that rival elite performance labs. Track sleep quality, fatigue levels, and soreness with surgical accuracy. Receive a personalized Recovery Score that tells you exactly when to push harder and when to rest.

THE SOVEREIGN ADVANTAGE:

• Daily Recovery Score — A single, powerful metric synthesized from your biometrics
• HRV-Ready Analytics — Precision tracking designed for the performance-obsessed
• Bio-Data Vault — Your wellness data, encrypted and private
• 7-Day Trend Analysis — Visualize your recovery trajectory with investment-grade charts
• AI-Powered Insights — Actionable recommendations based on your unique patterns

DESIGNED FOR THE ELITE:

Recovery Pulse isn't for everyone. It's for founders who treat their body like their most valuable asset. For athletes who demand data, not guesswork. For biohackers who optimize every variable.

THE SOVEREIGN PROTOCOL:

Begin with 7 days of complimentary access. Experience the full Sovereign tier — no limitations, no credit card required. Then decide if you're ready to unlock permanent access at $79.99/year.

Your recovery is your competitive edge. Track it with precision.

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
• Sovereign Annual: $79.99/year (includes 7-day free trial)
• Elite Monthly: $12.99/month
• Payment charged to Apple ID account at confirmation
• Subscription auto-renews unless cancelled 24+ hours before period end
• Manage subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase

Privacy Policy: https://github.com/akaminski23/recovery-pulse/blob/main/docs/PRIVACY_POLICY.md
Terms of Use: https://github.com/akaminski23/recovery-pulse/blob/main/docs/TERMS_OF_USE.md

en-US.promoText: 7-day complimentary Sovereign access. No credit card required.
